title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 7, ch. V, subch. A, pt. 250 - Scope And Interpretation Of Rules And Regulations In This Chapter
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 7, ch. V, subch. A, pt. 250 - Scope And Interpretation Of Rules And Regulations In This Chapter

State Regulations
§ 250.1 - Applicability
§ 250.2 - General policies on discipline of incarcerated individuals
§ 250.3 to 250.4 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 7, ch. V, subch. A, pt. 250

Statutory authority: Correction Law, §§112, 137

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
